d2l-alert.usage: border-inline-start-color when type is critical or error
border-inline-start-color when type is default or call-to-action

d2l-backdrop.usage: semi-transparent background color for backdrop overlay

d2l-breadcrumbs.usage: gradient start color (transparent white) for overflow fade effect
gradient end color for overflow fade effect

d2l-button.usage: text color for default button state
background-color on hover, focus, and active states
background-color when primary attribute is set
text color when primary attribute is set
background-color on hover, focus, and active states when primary

d2l-button-subtle.usage: background-color on hover, focus, and active states
text color and icon color for button content
text color and icon color on hover, focus, and active states

d2l-button-icon.usage: background-color when translucent attribute is set
icon fill color when translucent, focus ring color when translucent
background-color on hover when dark theme (tungsten @70% @90%)
icon fill color when dark theme
focus ring color when dark theme

d2l-button-add.usage: line color on hover and focus
icon color in default state (icon mode)
icon and text color when visible or in icon-and-text mode
circle background fill in SVG icon

d2l-button-move.usage: background-color on focus when dark theme
icon background-color on hover when dark theme (tungsten @70% @90%)
icon fill color when dark theme
focus ring color when dark theme

d2l-button-split.usage: icon color when primary attribute is set

d2l-button-styles.usage: border color in high contrast mode (can be overridden by system colors)

d2l-calendar.usage: border-bottom for table headers, background-color on hover for date buttons
outline color on focus for date buttons, outline color for selected date, background-color for day info indicator
text color for disabled selected date button

d2l-card.usage: box-shadow for subtle card default state
box-shadow on hover for both normal and subtle cards
text color and text-decoration when card link is hovered or active

d2l-card-loading-shimmer.usage: background-color for loading indicator container and animation
box-shadow inset color for bottom border
gradient start and end color in loading shimmer animation
gradient middle color in loading shimmer animation

d2l-count-badge-mixin.usage: text color when type is notification
default background-color when type is count (can be overridden by --d2l-count-badge-background-color)
default text color when type is count (can be overridden by --d2l-count-badge-foreground-color)

d2l-count-badge-icon.usage: border color for badge number positioning

d2l-dialog-styles.usage: border color for dialog outer container
border-color when nested dialog is showing
text color for native dialog element
border-block-start color for critical dialog header
box-shadow for header and footer when content overflows

d2l-dialog-fullscreen.usage: border-bottom for header, border-top for footer in desktop view

d2l-dropdown-content-styles.usage: default background-color for dropdown content (light theme)
default border-color for dropdown content (light theme)
default foreground-color for dropdown content (light theme)
default shadow-color for dropdown content (light theme)
background-color for dropdown content in dark theme (tungsten @ 70%)
border-color for dropdown content in dark theme
foreground-color for dropdown content in dark theme
shadow-color for dropdown content in dark theme

d2l-dropdown-button.usage: icon color when primary attribute is set

d2l-empty-state-simple.usage: border color for simple empty state container

d2l-filter.usage: text color for dimension set values, list header text, and info messages
text color for disabled dimension set values and body small text

d2l-html-block.usage: link color for default, visited, link, and active states; focus ring color

d2l-input-styles.usage: default border color and placeholder text color
border color on hover and focus states
border color when input is invalid
fill color for invalid icon SVG
fill color for invalid icon SVG inner details

d2l-input-checkbox.usage: gradient color for disabled checkbox background (regolith at 50%)
border color on hover and focus states
fill color for checkbox check mark and indeterminate mark SVG

d2l-input-radio-styles.usage: fill color for radio check SVG
default border color for radio button
border color on hover and focus states
border color when radio is invalid

d2l-input-select-styles.usage: outline color on hover and focus states
outline color when select is invalid
stroke color for dropdown arrow SVG

d2l-link.usage: link color for default, visited, active, and link states; icon color
link and icon color on hover state

d2l-list-item-mixin.usage: border-top color for separators, border color for dragging states
text color and outline for interactive states, border color for selected state

d2l-list-item-drag-image.usage: background-color for drag handle in image
fill color for drag handle icon SVG

d2l-list-item-placement-marker.usage: stroke and fill color for placement marker

d2l-loading-spinner.usage: background stroke color for spinner track
fill color for spinner SVG elements in certain modes
fill color for spinner SVG paths and circles
fill color for spinner background paths

d2l-menu.usage: background-color for menu in dark theme (tungsten @ 70%)
background-color on hover in dark theme (celestine-1 @ 50%)
icon fill color in dark theme

d2l-meter-styles.usage: stroke color for full meter bar background
stroke color for full meter bar when foreground-light attribute is set
stroke color for progress meter bar
stroke and color for progress bar and text when foreground-light attribute is set
color and fill for meter text

d2l-meter-linear.usage: background-color for full linear meter bar
background-color for full bar when foreground-light attribute is set
background-color for inner bar and text color when foreground-light attribute is set

d2l-more-less.usage: mask-image gradient color for fade effect when collapsed

d2l-object-property-list-item.usage: icon color when skeleton attribute is set

d2l-overflow-group.usage: icon fill color when opener-style is subtle
icon fill color on hover when opener-style is subtle

d2l-pager-load-more.usage: border color for button and background-color on hover

d2l-progress.usage: inset box-shadow color for progress bar track
background-color for progress bar when complete

d2l-scroll-wrapper.usage: dashed border-inline color for container and border color for scroll buttons
background-color for scroll buttons on hover

d2l-skeleton-mixin.usage: background-color for skeleton elements and border-color for skeleton containers
SVG fill color for paragraph skeleton patterns
SVG fill color in paragraph skeleton animations

d2l-status-indicator.usage: default state border, text color, and bold background
success state border, text color, and bold background
alert state border, text color, and bold background
none/null state border, text color, and bold background
text color when bold attribute is set

d2l-switch.usage: background-color for container and toggle button
background-color for switch inner when off
border color for switch inner and toggle button
background-color for switch inner when on
icon color when on and hover outline color

d2l-table-wrapper.usage: background-color for tbody and tfoot, also header background for light type
border color for default table type
header background-color for default table type
border color for light table type

d2l-tabs.usage: border-bottom for layout, scroll button background, and overflow borders

d2l-tab.usage: focus ring color, hover color, and icon color

d2l-tab-internal.usage: selected indicator border-top color, focus ring color, and hover color

d2l-tag-list-item.usage: outline color on hover when not focused
clear button icon fill color on hover

d2l-tooltip.usage: default background and border color for tooltips
background and border color for error state

d2l-typography.usage: text color for standard typography and reset styles
fill color for blockquote SVG icon
